Low's Bridal

About Low's Bridal

Low's Bridal began with six dresses in a room above the family pharmacy. 42 years later, Low's Bridal retains the personal boutique experience, while offering a selection of more than 2,500 wedding dresses.

About The Project

Mission: Modernize the digital presence for this 42-year bridal boutique with a sophisticated, mobile-responsive platform. The engagement included developing an advanced product catalog with multi-faceted filtering by designer and style, high-resolution imagery galleries, and enhanced product detail pages displaying color options, sizing, designer collections, and social proof from previous customers.

Technologies Used: Laravel (PHP Backend Framework), Tailwind CSS (Utility-First Styling), Advanced Filtering System, High-Resolution Image Galleries, Blade Templating (Frontend Rendering), MySQL (Database), Responsive Design (Mobile-First Approach).

Links

  • Laravel docs
  • Tailwind CSS

Before: From the Web Archives

After: Visit new live website

Summary

This project delivered a sophisticated digital experience for a beloved 42-year bridal boutique serving brides across the region. The centerpiece feature is an intuitive Collections page with responsive filtering capabilities, enabling brides to browse the extensive 2,500+ dress inventory by designer or style preference.

The product detail pages provide an immersive shopping experience with high-resolution imagery, comprehensive specifications including color options and available sizes, curated selections from the same designer, and social proof showcasing other brides who selected the same dress. This combination of visual appeal and functional depth helps brides make confident decisions during one of the most important purchases of their lives.
